title: Bloomberg Markets: Advertisers Stop Paying More for Less on TV
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Advertisers Stop Paying More for Less on TV
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Gerry Smith Media Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing why fed-up advertisers will stop paying more for declining TV audiences.
